metadata.title: Add PicoClaw Ultra-Lightweight AI Assistant
metadata.description: Adds PicoClaw - an ultra-lightweight AI assistant written in Go, optimized for minimal resource usage (under 10 MB RAM). Pre-built Docker image available from Docker Hub. Ideal for edge devices and resource-constrained environments.
metadata.author: Antigravity

operations.description: Add PicoClaw ultra-lightweight AI assistant container

template.title: PicoClaw
template.name: picoclaw
template.description: Ultra-lightweight AI assistant written in Go with a memory footprint under 10 MB and sub-second boot time. Supports multiple messaging platforms (Telegram, Discord, WhatsApp, QQ, DingTalk, LINE, WeCom). Optimized for edge devices and low-power hardware. Operates in two modes: Agent (one-shot queries) and Gateway (persistent chat interface).

env.name: PICOCLAW_GATEWAY_HOST
env.label: Gateway Bind Address
env.description: Network interface the gateway listens on. Set to '0.0.0.0' to expose outside the container (required for external access).

template.note: On first run, PicoClaw auto-generates /root/.picoclaw/config.json. Edit this file to add your AI provider API keys and messaging platform credentials, then restart the container.
